title: BREAKING: Curfew will be lifted at 6 AM & re-imposed at 6 PM on Saturday (14)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st);  Curfew will be lifted at 6 AM on Saturday (14) and will be re-imposed at 6 PM. Curfew will again be lifted at 5 AM on Sunday (15), said the President’s Media Division
